newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Thai Military Bank, Ambroveneto in Manila.
newsitem.headline: Thai Military Bank, Ambroveneto in Manila.

text.p: The Monetary Board has approved the applications of Thai Military Bank Public Co Ltd and Banco Ambrosiano Veneto to set up their representative offices in the country, Central Bank Governor Gabriel Singson said on Friday.
These would bring to 24 the number of foreign banks that have established representative offices, he said. Representative offices serve as liasion offices for the parent bank.
Thai Military Bank is the sixth largest commecial bank in Thailand, while the Milan-based Banco Ambrosiano (Ambroveneto) is the leading bank in northern Italy, the Central Bank said.
